reviewText: I can get this to play on my computer DVD player but unable to get it to play on my blue ray dvd player.  I do not see a way to contact the seller...may have to return! :(

I first herd of the INNER SMILE meditation in 2001 when I was going to Shiatsu School and learning about a toaist practitioner named Mantak Chia.
I lost the theVHS tape and never was able to find it again. then not too long ago I came across a DVD on Amazon entitled THE INNER SMILE. I LOVE IT AND MEDITATE WITH IT EVERY OTHER DAY. IT MAKES ME FEEL HAPPY, RELAXED, GROUNDED. A smile into the organs and the body along with thanking them for the work they do makes my day more invigorating, loving and peaceful. Thank you for the making of the DVD
